  3. D82

Hwang Min Jae

Introduction

D82 is a 4-member boy band under FlexM. They debuted in July of 2022 through the Mnet survival show Great Show Invasion. In 2024, they released their very first album "Take Off". The album was entirely self-composed by the members.
